textDari: آب که از سر گذشت، چه یک نی چه صد نی
textPashto: اوبه چې له سره واوړي، که یو نی وي که سل نی، فرق نه کوي
translationEn: Once the water passes your head, it doesn’t matter if it's one or a hundred reeds.
meaning: When a situation is already bad, further complications make little difference.

textDari: کار امروز را به فردا مسپار
textPashto: د نن کار سبا ته مه پریږده
translationEn: Don't postpone today's work to tomorrow
meaning: Do not delay tasks that can be done today.
